website_summaries.verdict: The updated Blade Stealth 13 is the best version yet of Razer's gaming ultraportable. A compact metal build, a gaming-ready GPU, and a robust feature set elevate it to the upper echelon of premium ultraportables.
pros: Gaming chops, 120Hz display are unique at its screen size
USB Type-A and -C ports (two of each)
cons: Performance won’t match larger gaming laptops

customer_reviews.title: Razer Quality and customers service is crap.
customer_reviews.text: Owned several Razer laptops (15 advance 2019) and all of them had issues. Decided to give it another try with 2020 model, and guess what - disappointment again. Dead pixel on arrival. Ordered another one - display is flickering... is it a joke? Luckily I have learnt my lesson and I do not buy directly from Razer or return for repair to Razer as they are so useless. So if you want give it a try always buy on Amazon, price is the same but Amazon will never let you down if you have defective device and will arrange return for refund immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It’s a high performer but it is HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop overall and definitely don’t regret choosing this option. The performance is just amazing...nothing lags, at all, ever even on the highest settings. It’s what I bought it for and I am not disappointed. It also looks great. There are a few things I was surprised by though: - It runs HOT. As in, so hot it could probably burn you. I think the metallic body probably makes this worse. We had to buy a separate base with a fan to actually use this on our laps.. - The battery isn’t great. The longest I’ve been able to use it unplugged is about 3-4 hours. Though I am running some pretty demanding games.
customer_reviews.author: jmc

customer_reviews.title: Quality control continues to be a concern
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews mention similar issues relating to fan problems, screen problems and other miscellaneous issues regarding quality control. Regrettably, 24 hours from receipt, I've found a dead pixel on my screen. Amazon will send out a replacement by tomorrow so it does not massively impact my life, however, it is unfortunate because these issues aside, this is probably one of the best gaming machines you can buy for quality of build (cnc aluminium chassis, quality components). Hopefully tomorrows machine is less of a problem
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, but Amazon misrepresented what they actually sold
customer_reviews.text: I cannot fault the laptop. I bought it to do 3D artwork and it easily copes with it. It's a handsome machine too. My only (small) criticism is the battery life. This machine is designed to be permanently plugged in. For light use, such as writing a document or browsing the internet, I might scrape a couple of hours. For more intense stuff like rendering 3D images or playing Fallout 4, then an hour is probably the max you're going to get from the battery. The Amazon advert speciffically stated there was also a 1TB hard drive alongside the 256GB SSD. That is simply not true. I couldn't be bothered to wrangle with them, but that amounts to misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.author: Akoola

customer_reviews.title: Freezes frequently
customer_reviews.text: Functioned OK until first running of a graphics-intensive game. Soon after that, it started freezing not just in that game but in other non-intensive tasks like web-browsing. Followed Razer's advice in checking Windows and other software updates etc to no effect. Only solution left is to do a full reset but this is a serious pain in the proverbial and really should not be necessary on a new machine. I'm left with an unreliable laptop with a curious ability to freeze while running very hot indeed. Battery life, even when not gaming, is as little as 4-5 hours. Good points - 144Hz screen is excellent and the laptop looks good - when it works.....
customer_reviews.author: Iain Dell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really good laptop with a beautiful design ! Perfect for gaming !
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gaming laptop from Razer.
customer_reviews.text: 2019 Razer Blade base model with 1660ti. I bought this laptop at its reduced price of 1099. At this price I feel the laptop is an absolute bargain! The performance is great, it doesn't get too loud and the screen, speakers and keyboard are all good. The only negative with this model is the average battery life. This is because this model has 2 drive bays which I value more than battery. I reviewed the product on youtube if you want more information, just search for mash it Razer blade
customer_reviews.author: D M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Laptop for everything, the packaging is delightful. The speakers are amazing. It runs all my games perfectly such as Battlefront 2 and Halo. Track pad is impressive and syncs beautifully with all my Razer products such as mouse and Headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising, 2060 model has Max-Q variant
customer_reviews.text: This is very well flagged for the 2070 model in the item description but nowhere says Max-Q for the 2060 model. I realised it when mine arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Valanides

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly worth the purchase in 2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2019 base 1660Ti and the build quality is the best out there. Can get hot to the touch in the middle but seems to function fine. Saved a lot of money buying an older year so very happy with the product. Plays all the latest games. Battery isn’t great but no gaming laptop is and the internal 256gb ssd is small but easy to work around with an external drive.
customer_reviews.author: Benthestig

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't have much to complain about, maybe battery isn't like the greatest, but this Laptop just provides an amazing user experience and the build quality is really up the part.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Trackpad broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: So the Razer looks amazing. And when it’s working it is amazing. Sadly the build quality is not remotely close to the look and feel. In a nutshell Razer is all style no substance. Trackpad broke after literally 2 months of fairly light use. Apparently this is a common problem and literally you should expect this too happen. High price, long in style, but will break after a few months. Avoid !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Lovely laptop that is a pleasure to use. Fairly light and sleek. The only issue is the rather sharp edges around the keyboard area (noticeable is the laptop is elevated and your arm rests on there). It certainly has power under the hood and plays all I throw at it. Also the 4K screen is crystal clear with great contrast.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Great specs for price: 1099
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family member: This is a great laptop. Base model 1660Ti. Great for the price of £1099. Love the touchpad. Comparable to my mac. Great specs. Can add nvme ssd. Has empty slow. Both RAM slots are used in dual channel 2 * 8GB 2933 MHz. 20 cas latency which is terrible Cons: very poor battery life. Very loud even on extend battery life mode.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop with excellent performance, the only bad thing is that it gets too warm and they stopped the possibility to undervolt the cpu
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Razer quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: Really good performance for the price in a really compact laptop - loving it so far! Build quality is top notch, the expandability is really good. It does get hot when gaming and a bit noisy but not to an extent that it becomes an issue, at least not for me - put it on a cooler pad and use some nice headphones and you’re golden.
customer_reviews.author: Constantinescu Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous laptop
customer_reviews.text: Runs all games I've tried on maxed settings at 1440p or 4k resolution at 40-60 fps. The screen is amazing for watching 4k video, very bright and vibrant. It only loses one star because it runs very hot (sometimes even when it's not running anything too intensive) so make sure you buy a cooling fan base.

However, the battery life did the opposite for me and even expanded and had to get it repaired and then it happened again with the battery expanding inside and bending the keyboard because of this I try not to use it as much as I did.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best laptop I’ve owned. It has all the power of my desktop in a robust and portable package! Absolutely love the metal body!
